title: When using password_hash() with the PASSWORD_DEFAULT algorithm constant, which of the following is true? (Choose 2)

choices.a: The algorithm that is used for hashing passwords can change when PHP is upgraded.
choices.b: The salt option should always be set to a longer value to account for future algorithm requirements.
choices.c: The string length of the returned hash can change over time.
choices.d: The hash algorithm that's used will always be compatible with crypt().
